name: Nime's Travel
description:
Nime's Travel is a quest game based on the collection and using of spells, not objects. The hero receives spells from the world, remembers them and applies them to objects to advance through the plot of the game. Currently, the game is in development. The completed prologue of the game is available for download. It has two locations, six scenes, two spells and a plot entry. The game is completely free to download and distribute, available as distributions for Windows/Linux and source codes on github.

In the final version of the game - the completion of the plot, the implementation of more than a dozen locations and more than fifty scenes, the passage of which will require up to two dozen spells.
